channel.title: Israel National Radio - Yishai Fleisher and Friends
channel.description: Yishai Fleisher draws on his experiences in the IDF paratrooper unit, New York law school, and daily life in Samaria to bring you a window into Israel. He interviews top leaders in the Jewish and Israeli political world as well as the good salt-of-the-earth folks living the day-to-day life in the holy land. Yishai is all about positivity and you will certainly be uplifted by Yishai and Friends. Yishai is the co-founder of www.kumah.org, an organziation inspiring people to move to Israel.

image.title: Israel National Radio - Yishai Fleisher and Friends
image.description: A neo-Zionist perspective on Israel and the Jewish World.

item.title: Atlas Shrugs
item.description: Yishai Fleisher and Friends Pamela Geller of Atlas Shrugs blog fame says America must wake up and smell the humus...
item.itunes:subtitle: Pamela Geller of Atlas Shrugs blog fame says America must wake up and smell the humus...

item.title: Tefillin on Arabs?
item.description: Yishai Fleisher and Friends Tsvi MiSinai reveals the story of Arabs in Israel who lay Tefillin - a commandment for Jews.
item.itunes:subtitle: Tsvi MiSinai reveals the story of Arabs in Israel who lay Tefillin - a commandment for Jews.

item.title: Changing the Palestinian Message
item.description: Yishai Fleisher and Friends Itamar Marcus of Palestinian Media Watch talks about how we can win the media war.
item.itunes:subtitle: Itamar Marcus of Palestinian Media Watch talks about how we can win the media war.

item.title: Is Saudi Trouble with Rebels a Sign of the End of Days?
item.description: Yishai Fleisher and Friends Rabbi Eliezer Sachs shows how recent events demonstrate how a biblical prophecy is coming true
item.itunes:subtitle: Rabbi Eliezer Sachs shows how recent events demonstrate how a biblical prophecy is coming true
